channel.title: [317] How do I rename Objects?
channel.description: Hey everyone, I wanted to make a City Teleport room, so you dont have to walk everywhere etc, and commands are annoying for when Pking etc ppl just tele away.. But yeh lets get to the point, I have got a portal named Trollheim Teleport, but I want to rename it to Rellekka Teleport, because you need to get there for quests and stuff, and Trollheim is pointless.. I once did this with NPCs and Items, so it must be possible with objects too I think? Any one knows what class it is in? I tried searching for ObjectID, objectID, etc but I couldnt find any.. (I have got Bluurrs client, Delta base I know thats server side but idk just sayin) Please post any!

item.title: [317] How do I rename Objects?
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

Hey everyone, I wanted to make a City Teleport room, so you dont have to walk everywhere etc, and commands are annoying for when Pking etc ppl just tele away… But yeh lets get to the point, I have got a portal named Trollheim Teleport, but I want to rename it to Rellekka Teleport, because you need to get there for quests and stuff, and Trollheim is pointless…
I once did this with NPCs and Items, so it must be possible with objects too I think? Any one knows what class it is in? I tried searching for ObjectID, objectID, etc but I couldnt find any…
(I have got Bluurrs client, Delta base I know thats server side but idk just sayin)
Please post any!
